title: FLIGHTS
desc: Tokyo is served by two airports: Narita International Airport (NRT) and Haneda Airport (HND). The prices of flights to Tokyo can vary widely depending on the time of year, airline, and how far in advance you book. It's always a good idea to compare prices from multiple airlines and book early to get the best deals.

title: TRANSPORTATION
desc: Transportation in Tokyo is very efficient and reliable. The city has an extensive network of trains, subways, buses, and taxis that make it easy to get around.

title: FOOD
desc: Tokyo is a food lover's paradise, with a vibrant culinary scene that caters to every taste and budget. Tokyo has an incredible range of food options, from street food to high-end restaurants. Here are some examples of food you might find in Tokyo: Sushi, Ramen, Tempura, Yakitori, Okonomiyaki.
